Title: Abigail
Lyrics:
Abigail, I know You're in control of her brain, 
Abigail And I know that You're the one that's speaking through her,
Abigail Miriam can You hear me,

I am alive inside Your Wife,
Miriam's dead, I am her head, 
Abigail, don't You think I know what You've done,
Abigail I'll get a priest, he will know
How to get her soul back

Oh Jonathan, this is Miriam
Our time is out
Remember the stairs, it's the only way
Abigail, nothing I can do but give in, Abigail

Jonathan, I agree...Yes I do

I am alive inside Your Wife
Miriam's dead, I am her head, soon I'll be free!
